packets.name: Mobile Status
packets.description: Detailed status information for a mobile. Version 0 (compact) is sent when viewing other mobiles. Versions 3-6 are sent for self based on expansion.

fields.name: Can Be Renamed
fields.description: Whether the mobile can be renamed by viewer

fields.name: Can Be Renamed
fields.description: Whether the mobile can be renamed

fields.name: Can Be Renamed
fields.description: Whether the mobile can be renamed

fields.name: Can Be Renamed
fields.description: Whether the mobile can be renamed

variants.name: Self Status (High Seas)
variants.condition: Viewing self, High Seas expansion with ExtendedStatus

fields.name: Can Be Renamed
fields.description: Whether the mobile can be renamed

fields.name: Aos Statuses
fields.description: Extended AOS status values. Array of 15 shorts indexed by status type.

variants.notes: Enhanced Client supports additional status indices 15-28 (HP/Stam/Mana regen, Reflect Physical, Enhance Potions, Stat Increases). ModernUO does not support Enhanced Client.

packets.notes: ModernUO supports 15 AOS status values (indices 0-14). Enhanced Client extends this to 29 values (indices 0-28), but ModernUO does not support Enhanced Client.

packets.name: Mobile Update
packets.description: Updates a mobile's basic display information (body, hue, position, flags).

packets.name: Mobile Moving
packets.description: Sent when a mobile moves. Contains position, direction, hue, and notoriety.

packets.name: Mobile Incoming
packets.description: Full mobile information including equipped items. Sent when a mobile enters view range. Structure varies by client version.

fields.name: Item ID
fields.description: Item graphic ID (15-bit, 0x7FFF mask). Bit 0x8000 indicates hue follows.

fields.name: Hue
fields.description: Item hue (only present if bit 0x8000 set on Item ID)

fields.name: Item ID
fields.description: Item graphic ID (15-bit, 0x7FFF mask). Bit 0x8000 indicates hue follows.

fields.name: Hue
fields.description: Item hue (only present if bit 0x8000 set on Item ID)

fields.name: Equipment
fields.description: Equipped items (terminated by 0x00000000). Always includes hue field.

packets.name: Mobile Hits
packets.description: Updates a mobile's hit points. Can be normalized to 0-100 scale for non-self mobiles.

packets.name: Mobile Attributes
packets.description: Updates all three attribute bars (hits, mana, stamina) in a single packet.

packets.name: Mobile Name
packets.description: Returns a mobile's name in response to a name request.

packets.name: Mobile Animation
packets.description: Triggers an animation on a mobile.

packets.name: New Mobile Animation
packets.description: Simplified animation packet for newer clients.

packets.name: Mobile Healthbar
packets.description: Updates a mobile's healthbar status (poison level, yellow bar for invulnerability).

fields.name: Show Bar
fields.description: Show bar flag. If 0, packet ends here (no subsequent fields sent).

fields.name: Healthbar Type
fields.description: Type of healthbar overlay (only sent if Show Bar = 1)

fields.name: Level
fields.description: Status level (only sent if Show Bar = 1)

clientVersion.notes: Classic Client only. EC uses 0x16 instead.

packets.notes: When Show Bar is 0, the packet is only 9 bytes (no Healthbar Type or Level fields). Poison (green) overrides yellow coloring.

packets.name: Mobile Healthbar
packets.description: Updates a mobile's healthbar status for Enhanced Client (poison level, yellow bar for invulnerability).

fields.name: Show Bar
fields.description: Show bar flag. If 0, packet ends here (no subsequent fields sent).

fields.name: Healthbar Type
fields.description: Type of healthbar overlay (only sent if Show Bar = 1)

fields.name: Level
fields.description: Status level (only sent if Show Bar = 1)

clientVersion.notes: Enhanced Client only. Classic uses 0x17 instead.

packets.notes: When Show Bar is 0, the packet is only 9 bytes (no Healthbar Type or Level fields). Poison (green) overrides yellow coloring. ModernUO currently sends 0x17 to all clients; this EC variant needs implementation.

packets.name: Death Animation
packets.description: Triggers the death animation and corpse creation for a mobile.
